creator: NSCAP_CBC
title: Social Media Sandwich Boards
description: These sandwich boards are created to be worn during parades to promote social media addresses.
steps: Measure and cut cardboard to the desired size.
Mark out a square area near the top of the board where the social media logo will be placed.
Paint the background colors of the board, leaving the square area unpainted.
Draw and paint the social media logos within the marked squares, using online references or a projector if available.
Add the social media address to each board, either by printing and taping or by painting it directly.
Make two small holes near the top of each board and attach them using string or rope, allowing the boards to be worn over the shoulders, visible in the front and back.
